price: Obi a osuro mfomsoͻ anaa anidaho bͻne bi wͻ nea ɔreyε nsamanseε no hͻ (anaa nea ɔregye nsamanseε no hͻ), na sε ͻtoto wͻn ntεm ntotoeε pa a, bͻne biara nna ne so. Nokorε sε Nyankopͻn ne Bͻnefakyε Hene, na Ɔne Mmͻborͻhunufoͻ Hene.
arabic: فَمَنۡ خَافَ مِن مُّوصٖ جَنَفًا أَوۡ إِثۡمٗا فَأَصۡلَحَ بَيۡنَهُمۡ فَلَآ إِثۡمَ عَلَيۡهِۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ غَفُورٞ رَّحِيمٞ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: faman khāfa min mūṣin janafan aw ith'man fa-aṣlaḥa baynahum falā ith'ma ʿalayhi inna al-laha ghafūrun raḥīmun
